metadata.title: missing permission checks in Digital.ai App Management Publisher Plugin (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: A missing permission check in Jenkins Digital.ai App Management Publisher Plugin 2.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins. 
            STATEMENT: The Jenkins Digital.ai App Management Publisher Plugin is not shipped in any of the Red Hat products. Hence, closing as not a bug.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
